description.value:
Ornate Brazier-like torch that burns prometheum at a highly efficient rate, lasting for months between refuelings and can be easily turned on and off by user. Holding one while it is lit gives +5 to Intimidate and Command Tests, and counts as Exotic Pistol Weapon to those that know how to use it.

Requirements

Weapon Stats: Pistol; 6m; S/-/-; 1d10+6 E; Pen 2; Spray, Flame; Clip 1; Reload 2 Full

Effect: Rare

Notes: -

Holding one while it is lit gives +5 to Intimidate and Command Tests, and counts as Exotic Pistol Weapon to those that know how to use it.
